select
from tr_pound_db_note p0 left join tr_purchase_db_application p1 on p0.billid = p1.id left join tr_purchase_db_application_detail p2 on p0.billdetailid = p2.id where p0.id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and p0.state = '1'
